name: Blackberry Honey Adult Patch
detailed_description:
This free patch adds 18+ content to Blackberry Honey, including:

  • Four uncensored sex scene
  • Six new CGs
  • About 12,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, Blackberry Honey, to download.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win XP+
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Storage: 80 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This patch applies 18+ content to Blackberry Honey. It contains several consensual lesbian sex scenes, and shows uncensored nipples/genitals.
